greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of sequence of fractions defined by a(1) = a(2) = 1; for n > 2, a(n) = (a(n-1)+a(n-2)+1)/a(n-2).
maple: a := 1; b := 1; f := proc(n) option remember; global a,b; if n=1 then RETURN(a); fi; if n=2 then RETURN(b); fi; RETURN((f(n-1)+f(n-2)+1)/f(n-2)); end;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 21 2002
